   Tom Kertscher
   By Tom Kertscher August 14, 2015

Wisconsin is only state with a fully funded pension system, Scott Walker says

   Scott Walker fired off 13 tweets on July 26, 2015 that cite
   accomplishments and highpoints during his time as Wisconsin's governor.

Where pension benefits come from

   The Wisconsin Retirement System provides retirement, disability and death
   benefits not only to all state employees, but to nearly all local
   government employees in Wisconsin.

Wisconsin's pension system has long been viewed as a
   national model.
